name: More Grillin'
summary:
More Grillin’ is the perfect summertime fun app for your iPhone, iPod Touch, or iPad. Fire up the virtual grill, throw on some burgers, hot dogs, veggie burgers or even steaks. Hear the sizzle and watch the flames dance, while you flip your food to cook it, then dress it up with dozens of sauces, toppings, and side dishes. All with sharpest graphics we’ve ever had (full resolution on iPhone/iPod Touch, iPad, and even iPhone 4 Retina Display!), and of course the attention to detail Maverick is known for.

After you’ve made your burger, bratwurst, or chicken, and given it the perfect presentation with custom plates & tablecloths, share a picture with your friends via email, Facebook, or save it to your photo album. And of course you can eat it! Take virtual bites and have your own picnic.
